author: Evan Dyer
title: An ill wind: the pandemic is giving states political cover for controversial acts
description: Crisis or opportunity? For some governments in a hurry to do things voters might balk at in normal times, the pandemic offers both.
content:
Calamity  as anyone who ever bought real estate during a recession knows sometimes presents opportunities.
For many governments, the pandemic crisis presents the perfect cover for carrying out actions they could only dream of before the virus struck.
